title: My Portable Gaming Girlfriend - Novel Updates
genre: Harem   Mystery   Romance   School Life   Sci-fi   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Dense Protagonist   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Yandere
author: 灯雨黄昏
description:
This is the era of VR games and artificial intelligence.

As an ordinary college student, I finally have my first girlfriend in my life!

Although it is the artificial intelligence in the virtual reality dating sim, my life has been turned upside down ever since...

The fights between the virtual two-dimensional 'wife' and the real live-in 'girlfriend'?

Artificial intelligence with self-awareness?

My virtual and reality don't seem right...>
